member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl
member.summary: ChartControl is the aggreggate class that contains all the other elements of a chart such as the axes and the chart display area. You normally instantiate and host a ChartControl instance in your application.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.summary: Specifies the mode of column drawing.

member.summary: Specifies the width of each column when is set to FixedWidthMode.

member.summary: Collection of custom points. Please refer to for more information.

member.summary: The font associated with this chart control.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.HidePartialLabels
member.summary: Used for hide or show label that goes behind an area edge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Radar
member.summary: Returns True if type of the first series is ChartSeriesType.Radar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Polar
member.summary: Returns True if type of the first series is ChartSeriesType.Polar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.RadarStyle
member.summary: Indicates the style of the radar chart.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.RoundingPlaces
member.summary: The number of places to round data to for display (by default).

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.SizeMargins
member.summary: Gets size with minimal height and width of chart control with enough places to draw chart area. This property must be used generally by parent control of chart control in order to determine the size margins.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.TextPosition
member.summary: The position of text displayed as the chart's caption. Please refer to for available options.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.KeyZoom
member.summary: Enables zooming with keyboard shortcuts.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.MinZoomFactorX
member.summary: The minimum allowable zooming factor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.MinZoomFactorY
member.summary: The minimum allowable zooming factor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ZoomFactorX
member.summary: The zooming factor is the value by which intervals are multiplied to have the effect of a more fine grained range. For example, if the calculated interval is 5 and the zoom factor is 0.5, then the zoomed interval with this zoom factor will be 2.5. Therefore, there will be twice as many interval points across the same range. Scrollbars will automatically appear to allow any section of the zoomed range to be viewed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ZoomFactorY
member.summary: The zooming factor is the value by which intervals are multiplied to have the effect of a more fine grained range. For example, if the calculated interval is 5 and the zoom factor is 0.5, then the zoomed interval with this zoom factor will be 2.5. Therefore, there will be twice as many interval points across the same range. Scrollbars will automatically appear to allow any section of the zoomed range to be viewed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Zooming
member.summary: Returns True if the chart is currently zoomed in.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ZoomOutIncrement
member.summary: Indicates what value to add to the ZoomFactors when the zoom out button is pressed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ZoomPositionX
member.summary: The offset position when zoomed along the X axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ZoomPositionY
member.summary: The offset position when zoomed along the Y axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Legend
member.summary: Configuration information for the legend object. Please refer to for more information.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.LegendPosition
member.summary: The position of the legend element. Please refer to for more information on legend positioning options.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Model
member.summary: The model contains all the data that is associated with a chart. Models can be shared between charts. Each model can be seen as a collection of a series. Each of these series contains data points and associated style information.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.CompatibleSeries
member.summary: Gets / sets compatibleSeries.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Series
member.summary: Shortcut method that provides access to the contained in the chart's model.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Axes
member.summary: The collection of axes associated with this chart. You can add and remove axes from this collection. Primary X and Y axes may not be removed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Indexed
member.summary: Specifies if this chart is to be rendered in indexed mode. By default, chart points have X and Y values, both of which are taken into account for plotting. In indexed mode, the X values are ignored. The X axis purely represents the position of the points and not their X value. This mode is useful when representing data that has no real X axis value except position. For example, sales of two months side-by-side.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.PrimaryXAxis
member.summary: The primary X axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.PrimaryYAxis
member.summary: The primary Y axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.AutoHighlight
member.summary: Specified if points on the chart should be highlighted when the mouse hovers over them.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ChartAreaBackImage
member.summary: The chart can display an image as its background. This property specifies the image to be used as the background.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ChartAreaShadow
member.summary: Indicates whether the ChartArea has a shadow.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ChartAreaToolTip
member.summary: The ToolTip text that is to be displayed when the mouse is over the area of the chart but not over other elements of interest within the chart area.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ChartInterior
member.summary: Specifies the interior of the chart. Please refer to for more information.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ChartToolTip
member.summary: The ToolTip text that is to be displayed when the mouse is over the chart but not over other elements of interest within the chart.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Depth
member.summary: Gets / sets axes depth, "coordinate Z". Only for enabled Series3D.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.DesignTimeSeriesType
member.summary: This property specifies the SeriesType to be displayed during design-time. Series displayed during design-time will be reset during run-time and are provided for representative display only.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ElementsSpacing
member.summary: Gets / sets value for spacing from border inside ChartControl e.g. space between ChartControl right border and legend right border if LegendPosition set to right.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.EnableXZooming
member.summary: Specifies whether zooming should be enabled for the chart along the X axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.EnableYZooming
member.summary: Specifies whether zooming should be enabled for the chart along the Y axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Palette
member.summary: The palette that is to be used to provide default colors for series and other elements of a chart. Please refer to for available options and customization.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Rotation
member.summary: Gets / sets the angle rotation of axes relative to axis X.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Series3D
member.summary: Allows 3D series.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ShadowColor
member.summary: Gets / sets color of shadow.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ShadowWidth
member.summary: Gets / sets width of shadow.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.ShowToolTips
member.summary: Specified whether ToolTips should be displayed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.SmoothingMode
member.summary: Specified how the chart elements should be rendered. Please refer to in the GDI+ documentation for more information.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Spacing
member.summary: Spacing is set as a percentage value and controls what portion of the interval partitioned for rendering gets used for empty space. Default value is 10%.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.TextAlignment
member.summary: This property specifies the alignment of the chart's text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.Tilt
member.summary: Gets / sets the angle tilt of axes relative to axis Y.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.PrintDocument
member.summary: The print document associated with this chart control.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.ChartControl.VirtualSize
member.summary: Gets size or if printing == True virtualsize. Printing == True when call method Draw.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Chart.Design.ChartControlDesigner.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Overrides Dispose. Here we remove our handler for the selection changed event. With designers, it is critical that they clean up any events they have attached. Otherwise, during the course of an editing session many designers may get created and never destroyed.
